title: Cryonis
desc:
Post 767
- Create an ice pillar, and have each player put a card on it.
- You may pick for the pillar to hold high cards or low cards.
- In 5 turns, whichever player played either the highest card (if you chose highest) or lowest card (if you chose lowest) will gain all the cards on the pillar.
- This card cannot be normally drawn, and must be drawn through 760.
